Address.value: 133 RICHMOND ST W,SUITE 602, TORONTO, Ontario, M5H 2L3, Canada

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Electra Battery Materials Corp is building North America's fully integrated, localized, and environmentally sustainable battery materials park. Electra Battery Materials is an integral part of the North American battery supply chain, providing low-carbon, sustainable, and traceable raw materials for the region's fast growing electric vehicle industry.
